Title: 37783 - # Tips for Trading Forex
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for trading Forex. Briefly discuss what Forex is and then discuss things like choosing a broker, keeping a record of your trades, performing analysis, etc. You can include the client link when discussing exchange rates and needing a money transfer. Your audience consists of people who trade the stock market or who are interested in trading.

Title: 37784 - # Tips for Doing Business Globally
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for doing business internationally. Talk about the importance of different international customs, traveling, staying in touch with your vendors/clients, local business laws, sending money overseas, etc. You can include the client link when talking about sending money overseas. Your audience consists of business owners or people interested in starting an international business.

Title: 37785 - # Tips For the Frequent Business Traveler
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for the frequent business traveler. People who are frequent business travelers are always on the go and still have to get things done and things in order while moving around. Discuss certain tips and services that can help the business traveler stay efficient. You can include the client link by mentioning that sending or receiving cash is often important in business travel. Your target audience is small business owners.

Title: 37786 - New-found Freedom: # Tips for Starting a New Online Business
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for people just starting a new online business. Starting a new business can be exciting and also overwhelming. Discuss some important tips that every new online business owner should know. You can mention the client link by mentioning how important it is to be able to send or receive money to vendors. Your target audience is small business owners as well as new or future business owners.

Title: 37787 - # Tips for Conducting International B2B
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for success in international B2B. Doing B2B opens up an entire world of opportunity for small businesses. With the new opportunity comes many new challenges that aren't faced when doing business domestically. Discuss some tips for small business owners to be successful in international B2B. You can include the client link by mentioning that it is key to have access to money where you need it when you need it. Your target audience is small business owners and small business owners that are in the B2B industry.
